channel.title: 508 RSPS help
channel.description: Hi everyone, I'm pretty new to coding, and I'm currently trying to code a 508. I have some things down and understood, but there's a lot of things that I don't know, and I would like someone who is pretty familiar with coding to help me with the coding and how to fix glitches and stuff. I don't need a coder unless someone would like to help me until my server is actually finished and he/she could be co-owner/coder, but I would like to have someone I could ask questions to about pretty much anything related to coding, like where to look for what and how to do things, ect. So if anyone could just be like a help contact it would be great! Thanks. :) you can contact me via MSN: jak_teh_elf@live.com or just leave a reply.

item.title: 508 RSPS help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jakofmoo, post:3, topic:350882”]Well if I were only allowed to ask a single question, I would make tons of posts and it would just take more time than it’s worth, I have a lot of questions but i know everything is related so once I get the hang of it it should start getting much easier, but if it’s needed that the post be deleted than go ahead. Thanks :)[/quote]You can post as many questions as you want in one thread.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jakofmoo jakofmoo

item.title: 508 RSPS help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Requesting a coder is not allowed unfortunately.
If you want specific help, you can edit your post with an exact question and I would be glad to help.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 RSPS help
item.dc:creator: @jakofmoo jakofmoo
item.description:
@jakofmoo wrote:

Hi everyone, I’m pretty new to coding, and I’m currently trying to code a 508. I have some things down and understood, but there’s a lot of things that I don’t know, and I would like someone who is pretty familiar with coding to help me with the coding and how to fix glitches and stuff. I don’t need a coder unless someone would like to help me until my server is actually finished and he/she could be co-owner/coder, but I would like to have someone I could ask questions to about pretty much anything related to coding, like where to look for what and how to do things, ect. So if anyone could just be like a help contact it would be great! Thanks. you can contact me via MSN: jak_teh_elf@live.com or just leave a reply.
